# RDUniform

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Shader uniform (used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="RDUniform_method_add_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_id**\ (\ id\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#RDUniform_method_add_id)

Binds the given id to the uniform. The data associated with the id is then used when the uniform is passed to a shader.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDUniform_method_clear_ids"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **clear_ids**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#RDUniform_method_clear_ids)

Unbinds all ids currently bound to the uniform.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDUniform_method_get_ids"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[RID](RID.md)\] **get_ids**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RDUniform_method_get_ids)

Returns an array of all ids currently bound to the uniform.
